fields.title: Pre-Arrival Booking
fields.description: Arrange your transfer before arriving in the Maldives
details: Contact us at least 48 hours before arrival
Provide flight details and arrival time
fields.tips: Early booking ensures availability and better rates

fields.title: Airport Arrival
fields.description: What to expect when you arrive at Male International Airport
details: Look for our representative with signboard
Proceed to transfer counter if needed
fields.tips: Our team will be waiting with your name on a signboard

fields.title: Transfer Process
fields.description: The actual transfer journey to your destination
details: Safety briefing and life jacket fitting
fields.tips: All transfers include safety equipment and professional crew

fields.title: Return Transfer
details: Arrive at airport with sufficient time
fields.tips: Allow extra time for weather delays and security checks
